name: Love Room VR
description:
'Love Room VR' is a simulation game of physical contact with a cute girl.
Please have a fun time with Nozomi Tachibana.Features* Realistic face and body.
* You can adjust body and face slightly.
* Grip move: Suitable for this game.
* Adjustable face and body. (#1)
* Adjustable lighting.

(#1: It's not a fully fledged function like character-creation.)keyboard and mouse control
Control by keyboard and mouse is not comfotable, but you can play.
However, this game is developed for VR device, so I recommend you to use VR device.Developer's twitterhttps://twitter.com/magnabokan
